title: 小白求教，关于scheduleAsyncDelayedTask的问题
author: 云闪
txt_content:
本帖最后由 splt 于 2015-9-26 12:04 编辑 

RT，我在API看到现在BukkitSchedule的延时任务有scheduleAsyncDelayedTask和scheduleSyncDelayedTask这两个方法
根据JavaDoc的解释scheduleAsyncDelayedTask
Asynchronous tasks should never access any API in Bukkit. Great care should be taken to assure the thread-safety of asynchronous tasks. 
Schedules a once off task to occur after a delay. This task will be executed by a thread managed by the scheduler.
scheduleSyncDelayedTask
Schedules a once off task to occur after a delay. This task will be executed by the main server thread.
scheduleAsyncDelayedTask由scheduler的线程管理来执行，并且不能访问BukkitAPI
scheduleSyncDelayedTask由服务器主线程来执行

求教大神！！！
1.那么如果我不需要调用BukkitAPI的话，哪个方法好一点?还是都一样？(主要是被scheduleAsyncDelayedTask方法的已过时的标记搞迷惑了QAQ)
2.如果scheduleSyncDelayedTask由服务器主线程执行的话万一这个Task卡住了难道会让服务器停止响应吗?

replies.author: 4one_R
replies.txt_content: API用sync，如果怕卡就用async然后总runTask来跨线程调用

replies.author: jiongjionger
replies.txt_content:
一个异步一个同步，没可比性。
另外推荐用runTaskLaterAsynchronously或runTaskTimerAsynchronously来代替scheduleAsyncXXXXXTask
